name: Young Professionals in Foreign Policy
goal:
Our mission is to foster the next generation of foreign policy leaders through events, networking and workshops. We have branches in DC, New York, London and Brussels (only the DC office has a physical office).

All our Brussels based team are young volunteers, with a commitment to engage in foreign policy and a desire to learn through on-the-job training.
interests: Climate Action, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives:
- EU Global Strategy
- EU Common Foreign and Security Policy
- Key transatlantic policies such as TTIP, data policy, elections and so on
